entry.name: CEAFDAS_DATA_SOUCE_ALPHA_RAW
entry.description: Raw data of an angle of attack sensor.

entry.name: CEAFDAS_DATA_SOUCE_BETA_RAW
entry.description: Raw data of a sideslip angle sensor.

entry.name: CEAFDAS_DATA_SOUCE_QBAR_RAW
entry.description: Raw data of a dynamic pressure sensor.

entry.name: CEAFDAS_DATA_SOUCE_TEMPERATURE_RAW
entry.description: Raw data of a sideslip angle sensor.

entry.name: CEAFDAS_DATA_SOUCE_PRESSURE_RAW
entry.description: Raw data of a pressure sensor.

message.name: AHRS400_ANGLE_RAW
message.description: Raw angle mode message from a Crossbow AHRS400 attitude and heading reference system.
message.field: Unix timestamp in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)
Angular speed around X axis (angular rate range*1.5/2^15)
Angular speed around Y axis (angular rate range*1.5/2^15)
Angular speed around Z axis (angular rate range*1.5/2^15)

message.name: AHRS400_ANGLE
message.description: Angle mode message from a Crossbow AHRS400 attitude and heading reference system.
message.field: Unix timestamp in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)

message.name: ADC_RAW
message.description: Raw data from the analog to digital converter
message.field: Unix timestamp in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)

message.name: GPS_GGA
message.description: Raw data of an NMEA GPGGA GPS sentence.
message.field: Unix timestamp of receipt in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)
UTC time of GPS fix in seconds from start of day.
Altitude in meters above mean sea level
Height in meters of the geoid (mean sea level) above WGS84 ellipsoid
Time in seconds since last DGPS update

message.name: GPS_RMC
message.description: Raw data of an NMEA GPRMC GPS sentence.
message.field: Unix timestamp of receipt in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)
Unix timestamp of GPS fix in microseconds.
Navigation receiver warning (A = OK, V = warning)
Mode indicator (A=autonomous, D=differential, E=Estimated, N=not valid, S=Simulator)

message.name: GPS_PGRMV
message.description: Raw data of an NMEA PGRMV proprietary Garmin GPS sentence.
message.field: Unix timestamp of receipt in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)

message.name: GPS_PGRME
message.description: Raw data of an NMEA PGRME proprietary Garmin GPS sentence.
message.field: Unix timestamp of receipt in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)

message.name: DATA_INT
message.field: Unix timestamp in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)

message.name: DATA_FLOAT
message.field: Unix timestamp in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)

message.name: DATA_DOUBLE
message.field: Unix timestamp in microseconds or since system boot if smaller than MAVLink epoch (1.1.2009)
